nodes.text: This Mandalorian was part of the Death Watch terrorist organization and was stationed in a camp on the snow-covered planet of Carlac around 21 BBY.

After junior senator Lux Bonteri arrived on the planet of Carlac along with Padawan Ahsoka Tano and astromech droid R2-D2 to deliver a holotrace device with the location of Separatist leader Count Dooku to the Mandalorian terrorist organization known as the Death Watch, the three were lead by the Mandalorians into their campsite.

After Lux Bonteri spoke with Death Watch leader Pre Vizsla and handed him the holotrace, this soldier along with a fellow one took R2-D2 to a tent which contained various broken droids and ordered him to repair them so they can use them for target practice again.

The soldier and the rest of the Death Watch were later seen attacking the Ming Po town under orders from Pre Vizsla and after the identity of Ahsoka Tano was revealed, the soldiers along with the Death watch members fought R2-D2s repaired junk droid squadron.
